LevelSelect.Text: Let’s take a look at the places we can explore!
Different levels yield different materials we can use for crafting!
Also, we can revisit certain places we have been to if we need to gather more resources there.
Whenever you're ready, just choose the place you want to go to!

FirstStageStart.Text: Welcome back! I hope you have prepared yourself.
You have unlocked a new spell thanks to your new equipment. Let’s test it out! Try to use it effectively to explore this area.

FirstStageStart.Bold: break down the area into smaller problems
FirstStageStart.Text: Always remember to break down the area into smaller problems and associate the obstacles with your spells!
